sub_title: Associate Client Partner at Korn Ferry
summary:
Client Partner with a demonstrated history of working in the management consulting industry. Leading consumer & life sciences sectors in Turkey and responsible from designing and delivering solutions for clients in fmcg, retail and pharmaceutical industries.
Strong experience in delivering business transformation projects that includes operating framework design, cultural turn-around or leadership mind shift 
Skilled in Business Planning, Business Transformation, Consulting, Sales, Market Research, Business Development, People Management and Development. Strong education professional graduated from Galatasaray University.
